task.title: How to Track Your Requistion
task.shortdesc: Check your requisition status in U Market.

step.cmd: Click on the "Main Menu" at the top.
View the list of your recent requisitions.
Locate the heading "Request State" to find what state your requisition is in.
If your requisition has been dispatched, click on the "Req ID" in the far-left column to find your PO number.
Click "PO Information" underneath the last item and a pop-up screen will display your PO number under "PO ID."
Copy and paste the PO number into U Market's Document Search tool to verify your PO is in U Market.
Contact U Market Customer Support at 612-624-4878 or umarket@umn.edu if our PO does not show up.
